title: #26: The Meth Neighbor, Birth Control, & Advice to Our Younger Selves
itunes:title: #26: The Meth Neighbor, Birth Control, & Advice to Our Younger Selves
description:
Mimi Evarts & Jordan Bosstick join Lauryn & Michael, to discuss a crazy neighbor on meth who dropped by their LA home, what your looking for when picking out a diamond, birth control, systems instead of goals, coconut coffee, how Snapchat has evolved over time, & they share some advice that they would give to their younger selves.

To connect with Lauryn click HERE

To connect with Michael click HERE
